author: mkirsano
body:
#### PR description:

Enable running External Decays in the HepMC3 mode (generator output is in HepMC3 products). Only photos++ running is enabled in this mode  for the moment.

#### PR validation:

Validated using the configuration files that are being added in Pythis8Interface/test
title: Enable running ExternalDecays (photospp only for the moment) in the HepMC3 mode
